nodes.text: The raid on the Skar'kla Consortium took place prior to the Clone Wars between the criminal organization known as the Skar'kla Consortium and forces hired by a rival Hutt criminal. The Hutt hired an enforcer to disguise himself as a Jedi and kill the Consortium's leader, Bothan crime lord Akris Ur'etu.

Akris surrounded himself with thugs and hired the Duros bounty hunter Cad Bane to defend him. However the imposter tracked down Akris who fled with six thugs into an Akris base. The Jedi imposter pursued them and killed the thugs while the Bothan escaped further into the compound where he meet up with his Weequay security chief. The imposter then killed them both while Bane arrived. Bane then battled the imposter and defeated him despite his advanced equipment, however the bounty hunter let him live on the condition that the enforcer showed the Duros how to make his equipment and allowed him to claim Akris's bounty.
The raid on the Skar'kla Consortium first appeared in the short story Reputation, written by Ari Marmell and illustrated by Thomas Hodges, which was published in Star Wars Insider 136 in 2012.
